title: Kaleido Star: Legend of Phoenix
alternative_title: Kaleido Star: Legend of Phoenix - The Layla Hamilton Story, カレイドスター Legend of Phoenix ～レイラ・ハミルトン物語～
description: Layla is going to perform Phoenix in Broadway. Playing this important role, she sets out on a journey by bicycle alone without leaving any message in order to find out what is missing in her.
